api_list.name: endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-mood1.p.rapidapi.com/mood"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-mood1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: add mood
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-mood1.p.rapidapi.com/mood/add/{mood}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-mood1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.put(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
